long_description: The Benchmade AXIS(R) Stryker(R) Knife boasts a tough tanto-style blade, easy-opening lock mechanism and contoured, grippy feel for secure handling on your outdoor adventures. 154CM stainless-steel blade with ambidextrous dual thumb-stud opener is partially serrated to take on a variety of cutting tasks. Strong, spring-loaded AXIS locking mechanism adjusts smoothly for ease of operation. Textured and contoured G10 fiberglass/epoxy handle is lightweight and easy to grip. The Benchmade AXIS Stryker Knife features stainless steel liners and a reversible tip-up pocket clip.
short_description: The Benchmade AXIS(R) Stryker(R) Knife boasts a tough tanto-style blade, easy-opening lock mechanism and contoured, grippy feel for secure handling on your outdoor adventures.
